p: (4) Cold deformation process affected the morphology and size of cementite particles, leading to different mechanical properties of the fine-grained ferritic steel. The steel containing spherical cementite showed a larger elongation compared to that containing lamellar cementite. After cold drawing, both σ y and σ UTS of the high-carbon steel (1.0C-1.5Cr-0.31Mn-0.20Si, wt %) were significantly high at 670 MPa and 740 MPa, respectively, accompanied by a good ductility of 26%.
